evanverse: A Utility Toolkit for Everyday R Development ⚙️📦

Source: R/evanverse-package.R
evanverse.Rd

The evanverse package offers a lightweight and modular collection of functions, tailored to support efficient and reproducible R workflows in research and analysis.

Details

It provides tools for:

  • Logical operations 🔁

  • Package installation and management 📦

  • Color formatting and visualization support 🎨

  • Workflow automation utilities 🛠️

  • Clean wrappers for common scripting tasks

evanverse is not a framework, but a personal, evolving toolbox — pragmatically built, cleanly organized, and continuously maintained for everyday scientific computing.

Ideal for researchers, developers, and anyone who values simplicity with clarity. ✨

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/evanbio/evanverse

  • https://evanbio.github.io/evanverse/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/evanbio/evanverse/issues
